explains: n. 饱和，饱和状态；（化学溶液的）饱和状态，饱和度；（尤指照相的）色饱和度；磁化饱和；浸透，湿透
wordGroup: oxygen saturation 氧饱和；氧饱和度
saturation magnetization [计]饱和磁化，磁饱和
saturation temperature 饱和温度；饱和点
saturation vapor pressure 饱和蒸气压；饱和蒸汽压；饱和水蒸汽压
saturation deficit 饱和差；饱和不足量；饱和亏缺
saturation level 饱和电平；饱和度
saturation intensity 饱和磁化强度

sentences.en: The concept of saturation marketing makes perfect sense.
sentences.cn: 饱和营销的概念很有道理。

sentences.en: The market for computer games has reached saturation point.
sentences.cn: 电脑游戏市场已达到饱和。

sentences.en: Japanese car makers have been equally blind to the saturation of their markets at home and abroad.
sentences.cn: 日本的汽车制造商对国内外市场的饱和同样视而不见。
